column5: Whether you’re a budding entrepreneur or have intrapreneurial ambitions, MSc Innovation, Entrepreneurship & Management will prepare you for an exciting career as an innovator.This intensive one-year full-time programme will build your toolkit in the three key areas of innovation, entrepreneurship and management, teaching you how to manage successful outcomes to create, deliver and capture value from innovation.We understand that innovation happens from collaboration, so this entrepreneurship Master's programme will help you get involved with Imperial’s dynamic and inspiring culture. The Imperial Enterprise Lab provides opportunities, networks and experiences for the next generation of innovators and entrepreneurs.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
